Any decision that will increase the EU debt must get the approval of all 27 member states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Hungary had voiced its disapproval of the package back in June when it was first proposed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But the move by Budapest on Tuesday has been seen as a petulant reaction to the Commission's recommendation to free 7.5 billion euros of its allocated EU budget as punishment for failing to implement reforms to address corruption and public procurement, among other issues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In a series of tweets, Prime Minister Viktor Orban dismissed remarks that Hungary is vetoing financial aid to Ukraine, saying the country is ready to give financial aid on a bilateral basis, reiterating that adding to the EU's debt is not the solution.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Internationally renowned for its stunning architecture, the Spanish city of Valencia has been selected this year among the 100 European cities taking up the challenge to be climate neutral by 2030.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Once home to a local fishing community, the famous Cabanyal area has been a lab for energy efficiency implemented within MatchUp, an EU-funded project aiming at developing and upscaling smart city solutions designed to support a sustainable urban transformation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: These solar panels have been installed in the framework of the match-up project.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It is one of the pilot projects that we are developing here.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: In particular, the city council launched a call for tenders to install this type of solar panels, the so-called solar pergolas, in five different points of Valencia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This public urban innovation centre will soon be home to the city's first socialised solar plant and 100,000 euro project, 80% of which is financed by citizens who have each invested between 100 to 2,000 euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Some 20,000 lampposts on the beachfront are being equipped with devices aimed at monitoring their consumption and proper functioning remotely.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Street lights are also used to recharge electric cars.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The initiative has been so successful that the municipality is now working to increase the initial 12 charging stations to more than 150.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: To make an estimate of the savings, just consider that installing a recharging point of this type costs around 2,500 euros, compared to 50,000 euros required for the traditional charging points.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Together with Dresden in Germany and Antalya in Turkey, Valencia is one of the so-called lighthouse cities selected to showcase large-scale demonstrations within the match-up project.
